description:
Beerus and Whis arrive on Kaiou-sama`s planet and detect Gokuu`s presence. While he is initially disappointed that Gokuu does not know what a "Super Saiyan God" is, he agrees to test his strength in a sparring match. Gokuu attempts to fight him in all of the Super Saiyan transformations but is outclassed every time. Beerus and Whis head for Earth shortly afterwards while Kaiou-sama uses his telepathy to warn Vegeta ahead of their arrival.
Source: Wikipedia

titles.title: Entscheidungskampf auf Meister Kaios Planet! – Goku gegen Beerus!
Kaiousei no Kessen! Gokuu tai Hakaishin Beerus
The Ultimate Fight on King Kai`s Planet! Goku vs the God of Destruction Beerus
界王星の決戦! 悟空VS[たい]破壊神ビルス
